languages.text: "Зачем? Это философская риторика, касающаяся лишь склонных к демагогии стар..."
"Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"
languages.original_text: "Зачем? Это философская риторика, касающаяся лишь склонных к демагогии стар..."

traits.locale_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这有什么好争论的？这不过只是形而上学的华丽辞藻罢了，指的是那些容易被蛊惑——”
languages.original_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"

traits.locale_text: “这有什么好争论的？这不过只是形而上学的华丽辞藻罢了，指的是那些容易被蛊惑——”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué? Solo es retórica filosófica para los viejos enamorados de la demago...».
languages.original_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué? Solo es retórica filosófica para los viejos enamorados de la demago...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜ？あれはデマに弱い老人について言及した単なる哲学的なレトリックで—」
languages.original_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ？あれはデマに弱い老人について言及した単なる哲学的なレトリックで—」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? Ce n'est qu'une rhétorique philosophique concernant des vieillards qui ont un penchant pour la démagog... »
languages.original_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Ce n'est qu'une rhétorique philosophique concernant des vieillards qui ont un penchant pour la démagog... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Weshalb? Das ist nur philosophische Rhetorik über alte Männer mit einer Schwäche für Demagog..."
languages.original_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"

traits.locale_text: "Weshalb? Das ist nur philosophische Rhetorik über alte Männer mit einer Schwäche für Demagog..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Neden? Yalnızca demagojiye zaafı olan ihtiyarlara hitap eden felsefi ve retorik..."
languages.original_text: "Why? It's just philosophical rhetoric referring to old men with a weakness for demagog—"

traits.locale_text: "Neden? Yalnızca demagojiye zaafı olan ihtiyarlara hitap eden felsefi ve retorik..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
